A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie had issues\, it's true. The pacing was off in some places\, and there were too many different plots to follow - scenes I had been looking forward to\, like the casino and the Finn/Phasma fight\, seemed a little underwhelming. It's definitely not a perfect film.\n\nThat being said\, I find that most of the criticism I've been seeing has been based off of personal speculation and fan theories not being recognized\, which is rather unfair and biased IMO. A lot of the things people have been shrieking over actually...really aren't that big of a deal\, to be honest. But in spite of having six movies to their name already\, people just can't let go of the Skywalkers.
